column4: hi. I keep trying to install the flashplugin non free but I get this error:md5sum mismatch install_flash_player_10_linux.tar.gz The Flash plugin is NOT installed."
apt-get. That's the error I get. And it's not wrong either: flash isn't installed.
sudo apt-get clean; sudo apt-get --reinstall install flashplugin-nonfree
if you run 64bit theres a 64bit flash plugin you can download from adobe.com and put in ~/.mozilla/plugins (you need to make the plugins folder yourself)
same error "md5sum mismatch install_flash_player_10_linux.tar.gz The Flash plugin is NOT installed."
no I don't have 64 bits. Barely have 32.
then head to something like http://www.rathergood.com/blode2 and it will be offered to you
with some drum n bass in the background
